choices.text:
When you were six years old, your sister was three years old (half of your age). Therefore, she was three years younger than you at that time.
Now, since you are eighty years old, we can calculate how many years older your sister is compared to when you were six years old by subtracting her current age from the number of years between now and then: 80 - 3 = 77 years. Therefore, your sister is currently 77 years old.
